00038 /* CSW Status Definitions */
00039 #define CSW_CMD_PASSED                  0x00
00040 #define CSW_CMD_FAILED                  0x01
00041 #define CSW_PHASE_ERROR                 0x02
00042 
00043 
00044 /* SCSI Commands */
00045 #define SCSI_TEST_UNIT_READY            0x00
00046 #define SCSI_REQUEST_SENSE              0x03
00047 #define SCSI_FORMAT_UNIT                0x04
00048 #define SCSI_INQUIRY                    0x12
00049 #define SCSI_MODE_SELECT6               0x15
00050 #define SCSI_MODE_SENSE6                0x1A
00051 #define SCSI_START_STOP_UNIT            0x1B
00052 #define SCSI_MEDIA_REMOVAL              0x1E
00053 #define SCSI_READ_FORMAT_CAPACITIES     0x23
00054 #define SCSI_READ_CAPACITY              0x25
00055 #define SCSI_READ10                     0x28
00056 #define SCSI_WRITE10                    0x2A
00057 #define SCSI_VERIFY10                   0x2F
00058 #define SCSI_MODE_SELECT10              0x55
00059 #define SCSI_MODE_SENSE10               0x5A

00062 typedef struct usb_storage_cbw_t usb_storage_cbw;
